item.title: Hello, World!
item.description: In this first article titled “Hello, World” (a bit Cliché), I want to write about why the blog started and the plans that I have for the future of this blog. In this first article titled “Hello, World” (Cliché), I want to write about why the blog started and the plans I have for the future of this blog. I follow a lot of personal blogs like Coding Horror, Martin Fowler, Paul Graham Essays and many more that I come across through Hacker News.
